blog.name: impassesart
blog.title: This could be a portfolio, one day

summary: Post-war Black Sisters... or what was left of them. Andromeda was quite defiant regarding her return in the good wizarding...
caption:
Post-war Black Sisters… or what was left of them.


Andromeda was quite defiant regarding her return in the good wizarding society. Having to deal with her renewed celebrity, along with all her losses and her grandson was hard on her. She tried her best to improve the public interest to for muggle culture and respect. Strangely, she was never associated with the Black name, ever.


Years after the Battle of Hogwarts,  people began to see a new ghost in Hogwarts. Mad woman seemed hurt but traumatized several students before she was ided as Bellatrix Lestrange by Neville Longbottomhimself. Unaware of her own death, she kept looking for her Lord. (… wanna know more?)


Narcissa Malfoy, who was so public before the war, became more and more discreet after the trials of her son and husband. During her last public apparition, face already masked by her widow veil, she simply said “She was from a world vowed to disapear.” Her money kept flowing to charity and good causes,often supported either by her sister or the Boy who lived himself. But she never leftthe Mansion anymore, except to go to the graveyard, where her black figure could sometimes be seen, by those who would quickly look away.

________

I fell in love with this post (and réf) for Andromeda Tonks 
I also used photoreferences from Senshistock, an incredibly usefull gallery, go check them !

tags: meanwhile up in wizard heaven tonks and remus are losing their shit
and ted tonks is just pissed he never got to make that joke for himself
summary: when he’s fifteen, teddy lupin discovers youtube, and for a whole year he ends every sentence by saying, with a giant...
body:
when he’s fifteen, teddy lupin discovers youtube, and for a whole year he ends every sentence by saying, with a giant shit-eating grin on his face, “thanks for coming to my ted talk.”

harry, who keeps at least relatively up-to-date with muggle technology via hermione but is hopelessly clueless when it comes to memes, asks andromeda with polite surprise, “teddy was invited to do a ted talk?”

and andromeda, who everyone thinks of as quite uptight but who definitely inherited the black family sardonic wit, replies dryly, “oh yes, he’s given thousands.”

body:
Asians at Hogwarts?

I just saw an Instagram post showing different wands that different characters used. And I had the thought that there must be muggleborn Asians with chopsticks.

  • First day in Great Hall. Hates eating with fork, knife, spoon
  • Specifically mails parents to send their favourite chopsticks
  • Because honestly I have a favourite pair myself
  • And I eat chips with chopsticks, who thinks I can eat noodles with a fork, not me lol
  • And that leads to man they better have rice and kimchi and seaweed, not just turkey and pies and Caucasian food because eating that everyday just makes me soooo sick
  • But other students thinking they’re wands
  • Some chopsticks are decorated and wooden and sometimes more fancy than wands (ie Draco’s)
  • Showing up to class and taking out a chopstick instead of their wand
  • “oh shit that’s not what I meant to bring”
  • Or using their wand as a chopstick
  • Tying my hair up in a bun and holding it in place with a chopstick but jokes its actually my wand
  • Just non-asian purebloods uncertain about these chopsticks and why are they essentially wands

title: R.I.P
body:
Harry Potter Letters.

Dear Severus.

Dear Severus. It’s strange to be writing to you, especially considering that you are gone. I would never have dared while you were here.I’m so sorry for everything that happened. The way you died….

Read more…

summary: Harry Potter and the Series of Plot Holes
body:
Harry Potter and the Series of Plot Holes

So in the fourth Harry Potter they introduce the truth serum and Snape mentions it’s illegal to use on kids and then in the fifth book they use it anyway because why not. So why didn’t they use it in the third book with the trial of Sirius Black. They could’ve poured it in his tea or Remus’s (like I know he was busy at that moment being a werewolf and doing werewolfy things but come on) or even the Trio’s. Like alright can’t trust kids well can you trust the truth serum. In this essay I will explain

summary:
Gryffindor: Do you even lift, bro?
Hufflepuff: Do I even- heck yeah I lift! I lift your spirits! How have you been? Everything...
body:
Gryffindor: Do you even lift, bro?

Hufflepuff: Do I even- heck yeah I lift! I lift your spirits! How have you been? Everything okay? I miss you; let’s grab lunch sometime. I was thinking of you the other day and got you these cookies.

summary: Can I get a ship from Harry Potter (riddle, marauders, and harry’s era) please? I’m average height, slim, absolutely no muscles...
question: Can I get a ship from Harry Potter (riddle, marauders, and harry’s era) please? I’m average height, slim, absolutely no muscles :( got short brown hair, and grey/blue/green eyes. I’m also bi! I love reading + theatre, my faves are les mis + hamlet <3 I like climbing too but am kinda crap at it. I’m quite quiet and can seem standoffish (I don’t mean to be) Im a hufflepuff and I would die for my friends. Can’t stand ignorance and bullies. Thank you so much :) xx
answer:
I ship you with….

Tom Riddle

Lily Evans

Cedric Diggory

reblog.comment:

Lily Evans

Cedric Diggory
